item.title: Phat to only 1 person please help!
item.dc:creator: @hybanks2000 hybanks2000
item.description:
@hybanks2000 wrote:

if you want you both to get a phat then put both
p2.addItem(Item.randomPHat(), 1);
addItem(Item.randomPHat(), 1);

the reason is everything with a p2. goes to the person you used the cracker with so this p2.sendMessage(“But you didn’t get the prize.”);
would be sent to the player you used the hat with but if you used this
sendMessage(“But you didn’t get the prize.”);
the message would be sent to you

item.title: Phat to only 1 person please help!
item.dc:creator: @iatchi1019 iatchi1019
item.description:
@iatchi1019 wrote:

when i crack the cracker it always gives them the p aht thsi is my code

if(itemUseID == 962) { int prize = Item.randomPartyHat(); int get = getprizes(); int UsedOn = (int)(misc.HexToInt(inStream.buffer, 3, 1) / 1000); sendMessage("You crack the cracker..."); deleteItem(962, getItemSlot(962), 1); p2.sendMessage("Someone cracked a cracker on you."); if (get == Item.randomPHat()) { sendMessage("You get the prize!"); addItem(Item.randomPHat(), 1); p2.sendMessage("But you didn't get the prize."); PlayerHandler.players[UsedOn].CrackerForMe = true; } else { sendMessage("They get the prize."); p2.addItem(Item.randomPHat(), 1); p2.sendMessage("You get the prize!"); } }

how do i fix it??? please help

Read full topic
